TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageHeaderAttribute extends System.ServiceModel.MessageContractMemberAttribute

summary.span: 指定某個資料成員為 SOAP 訊息標頭。

span.span: Specifies that a data member is a SOAP message header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性 (Attribute) 可讓您將含有 屬性 (Attribute) 標記之型別的欄位和屬性 (Property)，對應至 SOAP 訊息標頭。The attribute allows you to map fields and properties of a type marked with the attribute to SOAP message headers. 欄位或屬性可以是簡單型別，或可序列化的複合型別。The field or property can be of a simple type or a composite type that can be serialized. 如需如何控制 SOAP 本文內容的序列化，而不需修改預設 SOAP 封套本身的資訊，請參閱，[在服務合約中指定資料傳輸](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/specifying-data-transfer-in-service-contracts.md)，和[中使用資料合約](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md)。For information on controlling the serialization of the contents of a SOAP body without modifying the default SOAP envelope itself, see , [Specifying Data Transfer in Service Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/specifying-data-transfer-in-service-contracts.md), and [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md). 如需有關如何建立訊息合約的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用訊息合約](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-message-contracts.md)。For more information about creating message contracts, see [Using Message Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-message-contracts.md). SOAP 標準會定義下列可存在於標頭的屬性：The SOAP standard defines the following attributes that can exist on a header: - `Actor` 或 `Role` (在 SOAP 1.1 中為 `Actor`，在 SOAP 1.2 中為 `Role`)`Actor` or `Role` (`Actor` in SOAP 1.1, `Role` in SOAP 1.2) - `MustUnderstand` - `Relay` `Actor` 或 `Role` 屬性會指定節點的 URI，即為指定的標頭所指向的節點。The `Actor` or `Role` attribute specifies the URI of the node for which a given header is intended. `MustUnderstand` 屬性會指定標頭是否能夠解讀節點處理。The `MustUnderstand` attribute specifies whether the header understands the node processing. `Relay` 屬性會指定標頭是否要轉送至下游節點。The `Relay` attribute specifies whether the header is to be relayed to downstream nodes. [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 不會執行任何處理內送訊息，這些屬性的除了`MustUnderstand`屬性。 does not perform any processing of these attributes on incoming messages, except for the `MustUnderstand` attribute. 不過，您還是可以讀取和寫入這些屬性，即使根據預設它們不會送出。You can, however, read and write these attributes, even though they are not sent by default. 您可以用兩種方式設定屬性值。You can set the attribute values in two ways. 首先，您可以變更 上的 、 和 屬性First, you can change the , and properties on the . (這裡沒有 `Role` 屬性 – 請設定 屬性，如果使用 SOAP 1.2，則會傳遞 `Role`)。(There is no `Role` property – set the property and `Role` is passed if SOAP 1.2 is used). 例如: For example: 控制這些屬性的另一種方式，是將需要的標頭型別變成 類別的型別參數，並將結果型別搭配 一起使用。The second way to control these attributes is by making the desired header type the type parameter of the class and using the resulting type together with the . 然後，以程式設計的方式使用 屬性 (Property)，來設定 SOAP 屬性 (Attribute)。Then use the properties programmatically to set the SOAP attributes. 例如: For example: 如果同時使用動態和靜態控制項機制，則靜態設定採用預設值，但可以使用動態機制來覆寫。If both the dynamic and the static control mechanisms are used, the static settings are the default but can be overridden using the dynamic mechanism. 例如: For example: 允許使用動態屬性控制項來建立重複標頭。Creating repeated headers with dynamic attribute control is allowed. 例如: For example: ``` [MessageHeaderArray] public MessageHeader documentApprovers[]; ``` 在接收端，只能使用泛型 類別來讀取這些 SOAP 屬性。On the receiving side, reading these SOAP attributes can only be done if the generic class is used. 您可以檢查 型別標頭的 、 或 屬性，探索接收到的訊息上的屬性設定。Examine the , or properties of a header of the type to discover the attribute settings on the received message. 接收到訊息並傳回訊息時，SOAP 屬性設定只會為 型別的標頭而往返。When a message is received and then sent back, the SOAP attribute settings only roundtrip for headers of the type. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 為回應訊息建立 SOAP 標頭，此回應訊息的 、 和 屬性已設定為適用於這個標頭的值。The following code example shows the use of the to create a SOAP header for the response message with the , and properties set to values appropriate for this header. 程式碼範例後面是所傳送的訊息範例。The code example is followed by an example of the message when sent. [!code-csharp[MessageHeaderAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageheaderattribute/cs/services.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MessageHeaderAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageheaderattribute/vb/services.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Actor { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 URI，這個 URI 表示此標頭的目標節點。

span.span: Gets or sets a URI that indicates the node at which this header is targeted.

summary.span: 使用 SOAP 1.2 時，會對應到 role 標頭屬性，而使用 SOAP 1.1 則會對應到 actor 標頭屬性。

span.span: Maps to the role header attribute when SOAP 1.2 is used and the actor header attribute when SOAP 1.1 is used.

value.span: 表示此標頭之目標節點的 URI。

span.span: A URI that indicates the node at which this header is targeted.

value.span: 使用 SOAP 1.2 時，這個 URI 會對應到 role 標頭屬性，而使用 SOAP 1.1 則會對應到 actor 標頭屬性。

span.span: This URI maps to the role header attribute when SOAP 1.2 is used and the actor header attribute when SOAP 1.1 is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of for details.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MustUnderstand { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指定扮演 角色的節點是否必須解讀這個標頭。

span.span: Specifies whether the node acting in the role must understand this header.

summary.span: 這會對應到 SOAP 標頭屬性。

span.span: This is mapped to the SOAP header attribute.

value.span: 如果扮演 角色的節點必須解讀這個標頭，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the node acting in the role must understand this header; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of for details. > [!IMPORTANT] > 請務必記住，如果所要傳送之訊息中的 屬性為 `true`，而且接收端的應用程式無法解讀此標頭，就會產生錯誤。It is important to remember that if the property is `true` in a message being sent and the application on the receiving side does not understand the header a fault is generated. 相反地，如果某個標頭含有設定為 `mustUnderstand` 的 `true` SOAP 標頭屬性，並且由 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 所接收，則此標頭必須是訊息合約的一部分 (或必須由 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 的其中一個通道處理)，否則，就會假設無法解讀標頭，並擲回例外狀況。Conversely, if a header with the `mustUnderstand` SOAP header attribute set to `true` is received by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)], it must be a part of the message contract (or must be processed by one of the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] channels); otherwise, it is assumed that the header is not understood and an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 為回應訊息建立 SOAP 標頭，此回應訊息的 、 和 屬性已設定為適用於這個標頭的值。The following code example shows the use of the to create a SOAP header for the response message with the , and properties set to values appropriate for this header. 程式碼範例後面是所傳送的訊息範例。The code example is followed by an example of the message when sent. [!code-csharp[MessageHeaderAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageheaderattribute/cs/services.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MessageHeaderAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/messageheaderattribute/vb/services.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Relay { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指定這個標頭是否要轉送至下游節點。

span.span: Specifies whether this header is to be relayed to downstream nodes.

summary.span: 這會對應到 SOAP 標頭屬性。

span.span: This is mapped to the SOAP header attribute.

value.span: 如果這個標頭要轉送至下游節點，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this header is to be relayed to downstream nodes; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 SOAP 1.1 時，則會忽略這個屬性。This property is ignored when SOAP 1.1 is used. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of for details.
